title: LEGO Masters
overview: Teams of two LEGO enthusiasts compete to build the best Lego project. In each episode, participants will have to face tasks and create spectacular structures from Lego bricks. It will test the participants' abilities, creativity, imagination and technical skills. At the end of each episode, the weakest couple will leave the show. The best 3 pairs will compete for the final and it will be a real clash of the champions! The winner will receive the title of Lego Master and a prize of PLN 100,000!
